name: dsp-000 - .cyber .zerfall
description:
As of 22/12/2022, the game is not even close to complete, its still in Milestone 1, eg a movement controller, player model, level generation, and some refinements.

I will probs get the game done by april next year, sorry for not getting it done for the gamejam.

Controls:

WASD = Movement

Mouse to Look

Shift to sprint

TAB to toggle FP/TP mode.
